plays.text: Penalty to Andy Delmore 2 minutes for Tripping Jason Allison
Penalty to Lubomir Visnovsky 2 minutes for Kneeing Vladimir Orszagh
Penalty to Mathieu Schneider 2 minutes for Holding the Stick David Legwand
Penalty to Tom Fitzgerald 2 minutes for Tripping(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Greg Johnson 2 minutes for Holding Jason Allison
Penalty to Adam Mair 2 minutes for Holding(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Steve Heinze assisted by Jason Allison and Craig Johnson
Penalty to Philippe Boucher 2 minutes for High Sticking Scott Hartnell
Goal scored by Craig Johnson assisted by Mattias Norstrom
